name: Diversely
description: AI-driven, inclusive hiring tools and analytics that help businesses reach more diverse candidates and track, measure and improve available D&I data across eight elements. Their tools increase the reach of a talent search to under-represented groups by as much as three times and our D&I reporting capabilities have ensured our clients win and retain business.
features: DIVERSITY REPORTING: Assess current diversity data, benchmark and set hiring goals across 8 optional elements.
BIAS-FREE RECRUITMENT: Write inclusive job ads, post to diverse job boards and anonymise candidates to ensure inclusive hiring.
INCLUSIVE JOURNEY: Widen your talent pool and ensure an inclusive, transparent candidate journey.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Diversely provides a platform and approach which assists hiring teams to win diverse talent through knowledge, data and meaningful candidate selection.
ShortDescription: Diversely is a software platform that helps recruitment agencies remove bias from the candidate attraction and selection process

Highlights.name: Designing accessible recruitment websites for an inclusive user experience.
Highlights.description: Volcanic’s design team have a wealth of experience designing recruitment websites that aim to attract candidates all over the globe, no matter their background or ability, ensuring that our clients are informed in making their website as inclusive as possible is now a critical part of our design process.

Highlights.name: Data compliance
Highlights.description: To assist with GDPR compliance, Volcanic sites can be implemented with consent capture, Subject Access Request (SAR) and Right to be Forgotten (RTBF) tools to streamline your business compliance workflows.

Highlights.name: Platform tour Candidate attraction Boost candidate attraction and engagement
Highlights.description: The Volcanic platform provides a core set of easy-to-use marketing tools that help you engage, attract and convert the most qualified candidates for every role.

Highlights.name: Technology & security: Recruitment websites with end-to-end security
Highlights.description: We own and develop our own end-to-end technology solution, designed, built and deployed solely for the recruitment industry. It means we can deliver uniquely targeted experiences to cater for our clients' needs and specific security requirements, without compromise.  ​

enhanced_description: Diversely offers an AI-driven software platform providing inclusive hiring tools and analytics. It assists businesses, specifically recruitment agencies, in removing bias from the candidate attraction and selection process. The platform helps to reach more diverse candidates, increase the reach of talent searches to under-represented groups by as much as three times, and track, measure, and improve D&I data across eight elements. Its D&I reporting capabilities also aid clients in winning and retaining business by providing knowledge, data, and support for meaningful candidate selection.
key_use_cases: Analyzing and improving diversity & inclusion (D&I) data
Benchmarking diversity data and setting hiring goals
Posting job ads to diverse job boards
Expanding talent pools to include under-represented groups
Ensuring an inclusive and transparent candidate journey
Removing bias from candidate attraction and selection
